name: blogger-create-post
description: Creates and publishes a new post or creates a new post as a draft. [See the docs here](https://developers.google.com/blogger/docs/3.0/reference/posts/insert).

labels.description: The list of labels this post is tagged with.

isDraft.description: If `true` your post will be created as `draft`, otherwise, it will be automatically published (as `live`).

name: blogger-delete-post
description: Permanently removes a post (the deleted post cannot be restored anymore) [See the docs here](https://developers.google.com/blogger/docs/3.0/reference/posts/delete).

name: blogger-publish-post
description: Publishes a draft post [See the docs here](https://developers.google.com/blogger/docs/3.0/reference/posts/publish).

publishDate.description: The date and time to schedule the publishing of the Post. Date must follow [RFC 3339](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt) format. Ex: `2019-10-12T07:20:50.52Z`

name: blogger-revert-post
description: Revert a published or scheduled post to draft state.[See the docs here](https://developers.google.com/blogger/docs/3.0/reference/posts/revert).

name: blogger-update-post
description: Updates a published post. [See the docs here](https://developers.google.com/blogger/docs/3.0/reference/posts/update).

labels.description: The list of labels this post is tagged with.
